channel.title: Upgrade to SMF 1.1 RC3
channel.description: Why don't you upgrade to SMF 1.1 RC3? It has better security (ie, you have to enter a set of random letters and numbers to signup) and it is less buggy...

item.title: Upgrade to SMF 1.1 RC3
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

[quote=“mvp566, post:9, topic:20864”][quote author=Taylor link=topic=31720.msg375042#msg375042 date=1162231451]

i thing i hate is we would lose the function to say y we rep++ a person
[/quote]that’s actually a mod…

i know but it doesent work for rc3[/quote]yes it does ;), it’s the karma description mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade to SMF 1.1 RC3
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“mvp566, post:9, topic:20864”][quote author=Taylor link=topic=31720.msg375042#msg375042 date=1162231451]

i thing i hate is we would lose the function to say y we rep++ a person
[/quote]that’s actually a mod…

i know but it doesent work for rc3[/quote]

Yes, but you could easily modify it to work with RC3…
Anyway whoever coded it might create a newer version…

item.title: Upgrade to SMF 1.1 RC3
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:7, topic:20864”][quote author=ada link=topic=31720.msg376501#msg376501 date=1162266402]
There is a security issue in the current version of SMF, you should think about (at least) downloading the security update (which won’t delete mods…)
[/quote]

I did that the day it came out ;)[/quote]

Always on the 8-ball… eh? Good to know I guess.

Read full topic
